Exploding Skull

Description

The Exploding Skull is a dangerous undead mob found in the Necropolis. When killed, it explodes dealing damage to all nearby creatures.

Stats

* HP: Low * Attack Skill: Moderate * Defense Skill: Low * Damage: Moderate * Armor: Low DR * EXP: Low * Speed: Normal * Max Level: Limited by dungeon level

Abilities

* Explosion on Death: Deals magic damage to all creatures in adjacent tiles when killed * Undead Nature: Immune to certain status effects * Aggressive: Pursues the hero actively

Location

* Found in Necropolis levels * Usually appears in groups with other undead creatures

Strategy

* Kill from a distance to avoid the explosion damage * Use ranged attacks or spells * Be cautious of other nearby creatures that might be damaged by the explosion * Consider using knockback effects to separate it from other enemies before killing
